title: Postmodernism-Based Instructional Design and Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Application Strategies in Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and foundational understanding of instructional design theory
context.additional_context: Need to establish a flexible learning environment reflecting postmodern philosophy and contemporary social movements, optimized for smartphone-based collaboration and resource sharing

learning_goals: Learners can cultivate the ability to apply postmodern instructional design theory to mathematics problem-solving projects
Learners implement three or more nonlinear knowledge-construction strategies in a learner-led PBL environment
Learners complete mathematics modeling tasks reflecting social contexts using smartphone-based collaborative tools

resources: Postmodern Education Theory Summary Resource Pack
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
